org.tinfour.demo.viewer.backplane

Class ViewOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tinfour.demo.viewer.backplane.ViewOptions

  • public class ViewOptions
extends Object
    Provides specifications and options for rendering a model.

      • useRangeOfValuesForPalette

        public boolean useRangeOfValuesForPalette()
        Indicates that the color assignment should be based on a fixed range of z values rather than the minimum and maximum values available from the model. See getRangeForPalette.
        Returns:
        true if a fixed range should be used; false if the minimum and maximum values from the model should be used

      • setUseRangeOfValuesForPalette

        public void setUseRangeOfValuesForPalette(boolean useRangeOfValuesForPalette)
        Indicates that the color assignment should be based on a fixed range of z values rather than the minimum and maximum values available from the model.
        Parameters:
        useRangeOfValuesForPalette - true if a fixed range should be used; false if the minimum and maximum values from the model should be used

      • getRangeForPalette

        public double[] getRangeForPalette()
        Gets the specified minimum and maximum values that should be used for assigning a color to elevations when rendering
        Returns:
        a valid, two-dimensional array giving the minimum and maximum values for the color-assignment range.

      • setRangeForPalette

        public void setRangeForPalette(double[] rangeForPalette)
        Sets the specified minimum and maximum values that should be used for assigning a color to elevations when rendering
        Parameters:
        rangeForPalette - a valid, two-dimensional array giving the minimum and maximum values for the color-assignment range.
